newsitem.title: CZECH REPUBLIC: Czech BICS100 bond index rises 0.003pts to 102.415.
newsitem.headline: Czech BICS100 bond index rises 0.003pts to 102.415.

text.p: The BICS 100 index measuring the Czech Republic's most liquid bonds rose 0.003 points in Thursday's trading to 102.415, bank Ceska Sporitelna said.
It said the duration of the index portfolio shortened by 0.003 points to 2.375 years.

The BICSG 100 index, which Ceska Sporitelna calculates using only government bonds, fell by 0.010 points to 99.053 points, the bank said, and the duration of the index portfolio shortened by 0.003 points to 2.242 years.
It said the yield index YBICS 1000 rose 0.115 points to 1,070.657.
